title: Tell people what you think in a comment (step 8 of 9)
content:
Owned by Anonymous Last updated: Jul 27, 2014 by Anonymous


You can start a discussion by simply leaving a comment on a page, like this one.
Why not give it a try?
 

Go to the bottom of this page and find the comment area at the bottom.
Click into the text area and type something. Then, when you're finished just press save! 

Hint: You can mention another user in a comment by typing @ and then the user's name. That user will then receive a notification.



  


Author: Carl Weissler Date: 2015-04-27T14:49:26.866Z Comment: This is a comment
disclaimer: Users of this benchmark dataset are advised to check Atlassian’s official documentation for the most current information.
